content: उत्तम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उद्-तमप्] {@--1@} Best, excellent (<ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>); द्विजोत्तमः the best of Brāhmaṇas; so सुर°, नर° &c.; प्रायेणाधममध्यमोत्तमगुणः संसर्गतो जायते <ls>Bh. 2. 67.</ls> {@--2@} Foremost, uppermost, highest (<ab>opp.</ab> हीन, जघन्य). {@--3@} Most elevated, chief, principal. {@--4@} Greatest, first; <ls>Ms. 2. 249.</ls> --मः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} The last person (= first person according to English phraseology). --मा {@--1@} An excellent woman. {@--2@} A kind of pustule or pimple. {@--3@} The plant Asclepias Rosea Roxb.
